attributes.action: Make a grant of £2000 to anyone working, or willing to work, from home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A great deal of time and energy is wasted in people commuting to work. We are constantly hearing about clogged roads and trains. We have the technology so why not encourage and reward people willing to work from home. A small grant would enable people to acquire or upgrade to relevant technology. If they already have this, a grant would reward them for already taking this step.
